scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection, ca. 1954, consists of a manuscript copy of The Classic Anthology defined by Confucius, translated by Ezra Pound. The copy contains text excluded from the final published version, with Chinese characters in Pound's hand, and with an inscription by him on the first page.
